title: Tactical Skeleton
summaries: The Tactical Skeleton is a rare Hardmode, post-Plantera enemy that spawns in the Dungeon after Plantera is defeated. Once the player is within its line of sight, the Tactical Skeleton remains stationary before firing volleys of four bullets at them that deal immense damage.
It is one of the few entities that can be detected by the Lifeform Analyzer(Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) or its upgrades.

The Tactical Skeleton spawns most often in areas of the Dungeon backed by <linked>Tiled Walls</linked>, along with <linked>Hell Armored Bones</linked> and <linked>Diabolists</linked>. Removing these naturally occurring back walls will prevent these enemies from spawning, but they can be respawned by placing <linked>Cursed Dungeon Tiled Walls</linked>. These areas can further be identified by the presence of <linked>Diabolic Sigils</linked> and <linked>Molten Legion Flags</linked>, but these banners are purely indicative and do not influence spawning.
